ItemDesc: Upon use, all ally characters' DEF increases by <unbreak>25%</unbreak> in the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: The dream of all young Dreamweavers: 1. To have their name or work featured in the textbooks of Paperfold University. 2. To earn enough Alfalfa credits to cover permanent housing costs. 3. To own a spray can that can paint automatically! "Black-and-white spray cans are cheap, and those of other colors are expensive. Make sure not to pack the wrong one, or you'll feel it when the bill comes."
